name: Values Reflection Session
content: Hey everyone, it’s great to have you here in the first session. Are you all ready to go? Let me know when you’re ready to move on by typing #next.

This might be something you convey informally to people around you through words or actions. Without taking a time to intentionally identify what those are, it makes it hard for us to know how to engage with the world, with the people around us and with ourselves. When we live in line with our values gives us our best chance of being happy and content. What are your thoughts on what values are?
